panel.title: Wave AI
panel.welcomeDesc: Wave AI is your terminal assistant with context. I can read your terminal output, analyze widgets, access files, and help you solve problems faster.

gettingStarted.widgetContextOn: When ON, I can read your terminal and analyze widgets.
gettingStarted.widgetContextOff: When OFF, I'm sandboxed with no system access.
gettingStarted.dragDrop: Drag & drop files or images for analysis

telemetryRequired.title: Wave AI
telemetryRequired.description: Wave AI is free to use and provides integrated AI chat that can interact with your widgets, help you with code, analyze files, and assist with your terminal workflows.
telemetryRequired.telemetryDesc1: To keep Wave AI free for everyone, we require a small amount of anonymous usage data (app version, feature usage, system info).
telemetryRequired.telemetryDesc2: This helps us block abuse by automated systems and ensure it's used by real people like you.
telemetryRequired.telemetryDesc3: We never collect your files, prompts, keystrokes, hostnames, or personally identifying information. Wave AI is powered by OpenAI's APIs, please refer to OpenAI's privacy policy for details on how they handle your data.

byok.title: New: BYOK & Local AI Support
byok.description: Wave AI now supports bring-your-own-key (BYOK) with OpenAI, Google Gemini, Azure, and OpenRouter, plus local models via Ollama, LM Studio, and other OpenAI-compatible providers.
